trans-unit.target: powershell cmdlet
Enable-JobTrigger
Enable-JobTrigger
简述

trans-unit.source: Enables the job triggers of scheduled jobs
trans-unit.target: 启用计划作业的作业触发器
语法
说明

trans-unit.source: The **Enable-JobTrigger** cmdlet re-enables job triggers of scheduled jobs, such as those that were disabled by using the Disable-JobTrigger cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: **Enable-jobtrigger** cmdlet 重新启用计划作业，例如通过使用 Disable-jobtrigger cmdlet 已被禁用的作业触发器。

trans-unit.source: Enabled and re-enabled job triggers can start scheduled jobs immediately; there is no need to restart Windows or Windows PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: 启用和重新启用的作业触发器均可立即启动计划作业；无需重新启动 Windows 或 Windows PowerShell。

trans-unit.source: To use this cmdlet, use the Get-JobTrigger cmdlet to get the job triggers.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此 cmdlet，请使用 Get-jobtrigger cmdlet 来获取作业触发器。

trans-unit.source: Then pipe the job triggers to **Enable-JobTrigger** or use its **InputObject** parameter.
trans-unit.target: 通过管道将作业触发器 **Enable-jobtrigger** 或使用其 **InputObject** 参数。

trans-unit.source: To enable a job trigger, the **Enable-JobTrigger** cmdlet sets the **Enabled** property of the job trigger to True ($true).
trans-unit.target: 若要启用作业触发器， **Enable-jobtrigger** cmdlet 集 **已启用** 属性为 True ($true) 的作业触发器。

trans-unit.source: **Enable-ScheduledJob** is one of a collection of job scheduling cmdlets in the **PSScheduledJob** module that is included in Windows PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: **Enable-scheduledjob** 是一系列作业计划中的 cmdlet **PSScheduledJob** 包含在 Windows PowerShell 模块。

trans-unit.source: For more information about Scheduled Jobs, see the About topics in the PSScheduledJob module.
trans-unit.target: 有关计划作业的详细信息，请参阅 PSScheduledJob 模块中的“关于”主题。

trans-unit.source: Import the PSScheduledJob module and then type: `Get-Help about_Scheduled*` or see about_Scheduled_Jobs.
trans-unit.target: 导入 PSScheduledJob 模块，然后键入︰ `Get-Help about_Scheduled*` 或请参阅 about_Scheduled_Jobs。

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中引入的。
示例
示例 1︰ 启用作业触发器

trans-unit.source: This command enables the first trigger (ID=1) of the Backup-Archives scheduled job on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 启用本地计算机上 Backup-Archives 计划作业的第一个触发器（ID 为 1）。

trans-unit.source: The command uses the Get-JobTrigger cmdlet to get the job trigger.
trans-unit.target: 该命令使用 Get-jobtrigger cmdlet 来获取作业触发器。

trans-unit.source: A pipeline operator sends the job trigger to the **Enable-JobTrigger** cmdlet, which enables it.
trans-unit.target: 管道运算符将发送到该作业触发器 **Enable-jobtrigger** cmdlet，后者会启用它。
示例 2︰ 启用所有作业触发器

trans-unit.source: The command uses the Get-ScheduledJob cmdlet to get the scheduled jobs on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 该命令使用 Get-scheduledjob cmdlet 来获取本地计算机上计划的作业。

trans-unit.source: A pipeline operator (|) sends the scheduled jobs to the Get-JobTrigger cmdlet, which gets all job triggers of the scheduled jobs.
trans-unit.target: 管道运算符 (|) 将计划的作业发送到 Get-jobtrigger cmdlet，后者将获取计划作业的所有作业触发器。

trans-unit.source: Another pipeline operator sends the job triggers to the **Enable-JobTrigger** cmdlet, which enables them.
trans-unit.target: 另一个管道运算符将发送到的作业触发器 **Enable-jobtrigger** cmdlet，后者会使他们。

trans-unit.source: Example 3: Enable the job trigger of a scheduled job on a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 示例 3︰ 启用远程计算机上计划作业的作业触发器。

trans-unit.source: This command re-enables the AtLogon job triggers on the DeployPackage scheduled job on the Server01 remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 此命令在 Server01 远程计算机上重新启用 DeployPackage 计划作业中的 AtLogon 作业触发器。

trans-unit.source: The command uses the Invoke-Command cmdlet to run the commands on the Server01 computer.
trans-unit.target: 该命令使用 Invoke-command cmdlet 在 Server01 计算机上运行命令。

trans-unit.source: The remote command uses the Get-JobTrigger cmdlet to get the job triggers of the DeployPackage scheduled job.
trans-unit.target: 远程命令使用 Get-jobtrigger cmdlet 来获取 DeployPackage 计划作业的作业触发器。

trans-unit.source: A pipeline operator sends the job triggers to the Where-Object cmdlet which returns only AtLogon job triggers.
trans-unit.target: 管道运算符将作业触发器发送到 Where-object cmdlet，后者将返回仅 AtLogon 作业触发器。

trans-unit.source: A pipeline operator sends the AtLogon job triggers to the **Enable-JobTrigger** cmdlets which Enables them.
trans-unit.target: 管道运算符将 AtLogon 作业触发器发送 **Enable-jobtrigger** cmdlet 其进行启用。
示例 4︰ 显示禁用的作业触发器

trans-unit.source: This command displays all disabled job triggers of all scheduled jobs in a table.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将所有计划作业的所有禁用的作业触发器都显示在某个表中。

trans-unit.source: You can use a command like this one to discover job triggers that might need to be enabled.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用类似此命令的命令来发现可能需要启用的作业触发器。

trans-unit.source: The command uses the Get-ScheduledJob cmdlet to get the scheduled jobs on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 该命令使用 Get-scheduledjob cmdlet 来获取本地计算机上计划的作业。

trans-unit.source: A pipeline operator (|) sends the scheduled jobs to the Get-JobTrigger cmdlet, which gets all job triggers of the scheduled jobs.
trans-unit.target: 管道运算符 (|) 将计划的作业发送到 Get-jobtrigger cmdlet，后者将获取计划作业的所有作业触发器。

trans-unit.source: Another pipeline operator sends the job triggers to the Where-Object cmdlet, which returns only job triggers that are disabled, that is, where the value of the **Enabled** property of the job trigger is not (!) true.
trans-unit.target: 另一个管道运算符将作业触发器发送到 Where-object cmdlet，后者返回被禁用，即，添加的作业触发器中的值 **已启用** 作业触发器的属性不是 （！） true。

trans-unit.source: Another pipeline operator sends the disabled job triggers to the Format-Table cmdlet, which displays the selected properties of the job triggers in a table.
trans-unit.target: 另一个管道运算符将被禁用的作业触发器发送到 Format-table cmdlet，后者在表中显示的作业触发器的选定的属性。

trans-unit.source: The properties include a new **JobName** property that displays the name of the scheduled job in the **JobDefinition** property of the job trigger.
trans-unit.target: 这些属性包括一个新 **JobName** 显示中的计划作业的名称的属性 **JobDefinition** 作业触发器的属性。
参数
-InputObject

trans-unit.source: Specifies the job trigger to be enabled.
trans-unit.target: 指定要启用的作业触发器。

trans-unit.source: Enter a variable that contains **ScheduledJobTrigger** objects or type a command or expression that gets **ScheduledJobTriger** objects, such as a Get-JobTrigger command.
trans-unit.target: 输入一个包含变量 **ScheduledJobTrigger** 对象，或在键入的命令或表达式来获取 **ScheduledJobTriger** 对象，如 Get-jobtrigger 命令。

trans-unit.source: You can also pipe a **ScheduledJobTrigger** object to **Enable-JobTrigger**.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以通过管道 **ScheduledJobTrigger** 对象传递给 **Enable-jobtrigger**。
-PassThru

trans-unit.source: The **Passthru** parameter displays any objects that are created or modified by your command.
trans-unit.target: **Passthru** 参数将显示在创建或修改通过你的命令的任何对象。
-Confirm

trans-unit.source: Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 将提示您在运行 cmdlet 前进行确认。将提示您在运行 cmdlet 前进行确认。
-WhatIf

trans-unit.source: Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 显示如果运行 cmdlet 则会发生什么情况。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 该 cmdlet 不会运行。显示在 cmdlet 运行时，会发生什么情况。
cmdlet 未运行。
CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 支持以下常见参数:-调试-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction、-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 和-WarningVariable。
有关详细信息，请参阅 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。
输入
Microsoft.PowerShell.ScheduledJob.ScheduledJobTrigger

trans-unit.source: You can pipe job triggers to **Enable-JobTrigger**.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过管道将作业触发器 **Enable-jobtrigger**。
输出
无

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet does not generate any output.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 将不生成任何输出。
说明

trans-unit.source: **Enable-JobTrigger** does not generate errors or warnings if you enable a job trigger that is already enabled.
trans-unit.target: **Enable-jobtrigger** 不会生成错误或警告，如果您启用已启用的作业触发器。
